attributes.action: hazel m peel, war widow pensioner 78th year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Am angry at your dictatorial behaviour in not listening to us who RELY on Frenchay hospital, with its heli pad and who would die on the longer journey to Southmead in  a high density area, no possible helipad impossible parking. Angry at you not giving us the promised referendum. This is a dictator's behaviour. You should be ashamed of yoursef.Different if it were your family. HAZEL M PEEL (freelance writer/jounalist)Down with you and Labour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
